name: Hot Are The Odds
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD & Arrow Keys — Move
Q & RMB — Throw and Pick Up Die
Space & LMB — Jump
Esc — Pause

DIE RESULTS:
1–3: Explode die for damage equal to the roll
4: Heal self for 1 HP

COMMENTS:
It won't let me upload a cover image. D:<
